relevant_findings.seizure_activity: right greater than left periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Developed further visual disturbance to the point of being cortically blind and new left upper extremity paresthesias.

relevant_findings.imaging_results: Repeat CT showed some improvement in low attenuation of the bilateral occipito-parietal regions.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial cortical blindness resolved; residual visual field deficit and cognitive changes noted.
